```json
{
    "post_title": "Has anyone else noticed the incredible architecture popping up in the Happy Valley area?",
    "post_body": "Hey West Linn neighbors! I was just browsing around online the other day, looking at some of the stunning homes that have recently come on the market in the greater Portland area, and I stumbled across a few truly exceptional properties in Happy Valley that really caught my eye. \n\nI'm always appreciative of good design, and it seems like there's a real surge of modern architectural masterpieces emerging just over the hill. One in particular really stood out – a three-level home with these amazing forest views and custom white oak finishes throughout. The attention to detail, even down to the Tom Dixon lighting and Dacor appliances, just feels so thoughtfully executed. It’s inspiring to see such quality craftsmanship locally. \n\nI just wanted to share since I know many of us here in West Linn also appreciate a well-designed home and the beauty of the PNW landscapes. Have any of you seen any other remarkable new builds or renovations in the surrounding areas that have impressed you lately?",
    "engagement_strategy": "I'll monitor comments closely. If anyone expresses interest in the specific property or asks for details about the home I mentioned, I'll respond directly, elaborating on its unique features and, if appropriate, sharing the property website. If the conversation moves towards general architectural trends or local design, I'll engage authentically, sharing my own appreciation and asking follow-up questions to keep the discussion going. I'll avoid pushing the property unless the conversation naturally leads there.",
    "key_talking_points": [
        "Acknowledge and appreciate good design and craftsmanship.",
        "Highlight the property's unique architectural elements (3 levels, forest views, custom white oak).",
        "Mention high-end features (Tom Dixon lighting, Dacor appliances) subtly.",
        "Position Happy Valley as a place for exceptional modern homes.",
        "Express genuine interest in other community members' discoveries."
    ],
    "call_to_action": "Share any other remarkable new builds or renovations you've seen in the area."
}
```
